Articles.Content:
KSP version: 0.25.0.642 Windows 32bit

OS: Windows 8.1 (6.3.9600) 64bit

CPU: Intel® Core i7-4700MQ CPU @ 2.40GHz (8)

RAM: 7913

GPU: Intel® HD Graphics 4600 (1988MB)

SM: 30 (Direct3D 9.0c [nvumdshim.dll 9.18.13.4460])

Mods: (all downloaded within the past week for .25)

blizzy's toolbar

Deadly Reentry

Kerbal Engineer Redux

Ferram Aerospace Research

Kerbal Attachment System

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

KW Rocketry

Procedural Fairings

Real Chutes

Remote Tech

TAC Life Support

Kerbal Alarm Clock

ModuleManager

Problem/Reproduction: The game was working perfectly with all these mods just in the last couple days. Today, after making no changes to the game since I last played it (nor my system, to my knowledge), when trying to launch the game, a black screen opens up, the mouse switches to a loading icon for a moment, then the mouse switches back to a pointer but the screen remains black, not starting the file loading sequence or showing any graphics. I have to 'end task' to shut it down.

KSP_Data output_log

Hopefully that's all the info you guys need to help with this problem.
